nodes.text: Nantoon was a location. At one point it was besieged by forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire led by Darth Malora.

Nantoon was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne update 5.10, in a conversation between The Commander, the player character, and Gnost-Dural that only occurs if the player chooses to side with the Galactic Republic. It was first mentioned in the 2015 Canon film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
